desc: We are a dedicated facility producing gluten free, vegan, dairy free, gmo-free, peanut free, and nut-free muffins, cookies and granolas for your enjoyment.

layout.text: Red Plate Foods is on a mission to make life more delicious and normal for people with special diets. Find us in the bakery or cereal section of your favorite grocery store or order online for delivery direct to your door.
